report.name: proeta1

dataSource.name: Q_1
dataSource.select: select P.libpspe libpspe, RTRIM(LTRIM(BR.libbr)) ||'/'|| RTRIM(LTRIM(D.libdir )) libdir , substr(:p_param6,1,4), decode(length(rtrim(LPAD(:p_param7, 7, '0'),'**')), 3, substr(S.libdsg, 1, 8), 5, substr(S.libdsg,1,12),S.libdsg) sigle, decode(substr(LPAD(:p_param7, 7, '0'), 4, 4), '****', substr(TO_CHAR(L.codsg, 'FM0000000'), 1, 5), LPAD(:p_param7, 7, '0')) param, L.pid pid, L.pcle pcle, L.typproj typproj, L.arctype arctype, L.codcamo codcamo, substr(L.pnom,1,25) , substr(R.rnom,1,18) , L.codsg codsg, conso.cusag xcusag0, budg.reestime preesancou, budg.bnmont bnmont, budg.annee bnannee, budg.anmont anmont, budg.annee anannee, (C.clisigle || ' - ' || L.clicode) sigledir, to_char(:p_param10,'YYYY') annee, to_char(add_months(:p_param10,12),'YYYY') anneesup, pack_verif_proeta1.f_reserve(L.pid,to_char(:p_param10,'YYYY')) bpmont3, pack_verif_proeta1.f_reserve(L.pid, to_char(add_months(:p_param10, 12),'YYYY')) bpmont1 from proj_spe P, ligne_bip L, ressource R, struct_info S, consomme conso, budget budg, client_mo C, directions D, branches BR where P.codpspe=L.codpspe and R.ident=L.pcpi and S.codsg=L.codsg and C.clicode=L.clicode and conso.pid(+)=L.pid and conso.annee (+) =to_number( to_char(:p_param10,'YYYY')) and budg.pid(+)=L.pid and budg.annee (+)= to_number(to_char(:p_param10,'YYYY')) and S.coddir=D.coddir and D.codbr=BR.codbr &p_where order by P.libpspe, libbr, libdir, sigle, sigledir, substr(:p_param6,1,4), L.pid, L.pcle

dataDescriptor.expression: RTRIM ( LTRIM ( BR.libbr ) ) || '/' || RTRIM ( LTRIM ( D.libdir ) )
decode ( length ( rtrim ( LPAD ( : p_param7 , 7 , '0' ) , '**' ) ) , 3 , substr ( S.libdsg , 1 , 8 ) , 5 , substr ( S.libdsg , 1 , 12 ) , S.libdsg )
decode ( substr ( LPAD ( : p_param7 , 7 , '0' ) , 4 , 4 ) , '****' , substr ( TO_CHAR ( L.codsg , 'FM0000000' ) , 1 , 5 ) , LPAD ( : p_param7 , 7 , '0' ) )

function.name: afterpform
